Description:
NO PROGRESS PAYMENTS! TOP LOCATION!
Located in the prestigious leafy suburb of Clyde, perfectly positioned between both a thriving city and stunning parklands, Parkview on Clyde offers the perfect combination of community and location.
With Melbourne's vibrant city just 48.1kms away, and Shopping on Clyde down the road, residents have plenty of options when it comes to shopping and dining out. A reliable bus and purposed future train network all within walking distance, making travelling to and from the estate a breeze.
This welcoming community offers a wide range of amenities and activities to enjoy, whilst being close to all the local conveniences you need to continue to live an active and low maintenance lifestyle.
A uniquely planned community, this terrific estate will cater to your every need!
Now is the time to take advantage of these quality townhouses which are ideal to live in or for investment.
The amazing benefits of these townhouses are as follows:
• Directly opposite Clyde Primary School
• Within walking distance to the Proposed Clyde Town Centre and Clyde Train Station
• No progress payments
• No Plans for Body Corporate
• Fantastic Rental Income of $370 to $390 per week
• Maximum saving on stamp duty (conditions apply)
• Full advantage of tax depreciation
• Brand new property with upgraded inclusions
• Receive an additional $10,000 Government grant if you are a 1St home buyer
No progress payments!
This is a huge attraction and means up until completion, there will be no loan payments or any loss of money. For example, if you were to build a brand new house and land package with another builder, you will be paying progress payments and would be charged interest during the entire building stage. With Parkview On Clyde, this is not the case. All that is required is a 10% deposit once finance has been approved and the balance of money is only due once your townhouse is completed.
Once completed a tenant will be organised to move in.
For more information visit: www.parkviewonclyde.com.au

Description:
BEAUTIFUL & SPACIOUS!
Presenting an amazing 4 bed plus study double storey home with all the bells & whistles. Constructed with the most brilliant quality & care, this 2 year old home ticks the boxes for first home buyers & growing families. As you walk through this immaculately presented 34sq home, you will notice the quality of workmanship and an endless list of quality inclusions.
Upstairs you have 4 generous bedrooms, including master bedroom with uninterrupted views of the future recreation parklands and featuring walk in robe, ensuite with dual vanity, large shower, and seperate toilet. The three remaining bedrooms have built in robes accompanied by a central designer bathroom with separate toilet. With an additional linen cupboard upstairs, there is more than enough space to satisfy all your storage needs. There is even a leisure living area!
Downstairs boasts an open plan kitchen with large walk in pantry that hides the fridge, a dining/family area, powder room, spacious study and another separate lounge! The study could be easily converted to a 5th bedroom. Three living spaces give the whole family their own personal relaxation areas.
This exceptional home is the perfect way to begin your new lifestyle, and the features do not stop there, with outside featuring an amazing outdoor covered alfresco plus an open pergola area for those weekend bbq's. There is a seperate paved area for the kids to play basketball, and a brand new fully manicured backyard with plenty of space for children or pets to enjoy.
With a brand new park and future primary school just down the street, views of upcoming recreation facility, and easy access to arterial roads, this is truly a family friendly location. This luxurious property must be inspected to be fully appreciated, contact Daniel today!
INCLUSION LIST:
Ducted heating
Evaporative cooling
2700mm ceilings
Stone benchtops to kitchen
Subway tile splashback
900mm oven/cooktop
900mm rangehood
Stainless dishwasher
Walk in pantry
Roller blinds throughout
Tiled and carpeted floors
Merbau decking
Concreted driveway & paths
Please note : Photo I.D. required at all inspections
COVID-19: We will provide you with hand sanitiser prior to entering the property. We ask that you please adhere to the current social distancing rules while inspecting the home, and please refrain from touching any surfaces within the property. If you are unwell, or have been in contact with someone who is unwell, we ask that you please do not attend the inspection, and instead we can assist you with a virtual tour of the property or we can provide a virtual inspection via facetime. Thank you for your cooperation.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to ensure the accuracy of the above information, but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or the agent. Prospective purchasers should make their own inquiries to verify the information contained in this document.
Internal area
268m²

Edgebrook Estate Living
This flat parcel of land is located in Edgebrook Estate, developed by well known Stockland group. This estate is an exciting new development and the place to be.
Designed to be family friendly and set alongside Clyde Creek, this lovely location will feature tree lined streets, walking and cycling paths along with an amazing central park in the near future.
With a short drive to schools, childcare, shops, public transport and more, why would you wait? Take action now and take advantage of low interest rates.

Description:
Brand New - Ready To Move In
Brand new and built to exacting standards this Porter Davis residence will be sure to tick the boxes with such impressive features, a superb setting and memories for a lifetime for you and your family.
Light-filled interior with a great blend of timber floors and high-quality carpet flowing through the living areas, a sleek open-plan kitchen equipped with Caesarstone bench-tops, island bench and stainless-steel appliances will be enjoyed by the entire family. Overlooking the beautiful grassed area with plenty of scope for a great entertaining space - perfect for indoor/outdoor enjoyment. Additional formal living area creates a wonderful blend of comfort and seclusion for the growing family. Complemented by four spacious bedrooms, generous master with walk in robe and ensuite and remaining three with built in robes. Other features include walk in pantry, alarm, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and remote double garage with internal access. The Edgebrook estate proudly brought to you by Stockland is another showcase of a wonderful master community with walking tracks and waterways within moments, only minutes to Schooling, Shopping Village and public transport.
Contact Ryan today for more information.

Description:
Elegant family house in Clyde
UpHill Real Estate proudly presents this house in family oriented Hartleigh Estate!!
Comprising of a large master bedroom with walking robe & private bathroom with double vanity, three more spacious rooms with built in robes, and stylish main bathroom, front separate living area, an open plan expansive living, dining finished with kitchen, stone island benchtop, 900mm stainless steel under-mount cooktop & oven, double-dishwasher & large walk in pantry, a beautiful covered alfresco with a decent size back yard.
Your new house includes
- Elegant front landscaping with brick-wall & decking
- LED downlights to hallway, kitchen, meals, living and lounge
- Timber looking floor board to hall way kitchen, dining and two livings
- Five burner undermount cook top and oven
- Double Dishwasher
- Quality carpets to rooms
- Entertainers Dream of a Pergola & Backyard comprising
- Ducted heating
- Double Lockup double garage with internal access to house
- Quality Blinds
Call Ravi on 0444 522 762 or Dilshan on 0402 696 602 to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.

- 4 spacious bedrooms with BIR and master bedroom with ensuite and his/hers WIR

Gas ducted heating, split system cooling throughout, rear garage access and timber floorboards throughout. Close to schools, public transport, shops and adjacent to Pasadena Park. Get in quick, don't miss out on this remarkable home!

Description:
Simply wow
Situated on 448m2 sits this beautiful 25 square (approx.), family home.
Walkthrough the front door into your first of two living rooms ideal for a large open study, parents retreat or kids game room. Continuing through to your quality, centrally located kitchen offering all the bells and whistles; Miele dishwasher, walk in pantry, 900mm stainless steel appliances, 40mm stone benchtops and glass splashback - don't forget the chalkboard pantry door! The master bedroom offers walk-in robe and ensuite with access to the rear garden/8-seater spa, so no going through the home all soaking wet!
Furthermore, the home offers double garage with internal access and extremely easy to maintain gardens. Both ducted heating and split system heating/cooling, and alfresco entertaining.
Features include:
- 448m2 block (approx.)
- 25 square home (approx.)
- Short walk to parks and shops
- Zoned for Willandra Rise P.S
- Outdoor Spa
- Opticomm Fibre
- Blackout blinds throughout
- Built 2013
Don't miss your chance to buy such a perfect home, call Jared McGovern or Samantha Styles now!

Description:
LASTING IMPRESSION
First impressions are lasting impressions, boasting a modern façade and instant street appeal, this quality SJD built home is not your standard residence.
The first thing you will notice on entry is the soaring 12 foot ceiling and the beautiful pendant lighting in the hallway. To the right you will find the master bedroom with plantation shutters, walk in robe and full ensuite. Moving through to the main living and dining zone you will love the natural light and sense of space that it offers. The kitchen compliments the elegance of home with stone bench top, stainless steel appliances and WIP.
One of the stand out features of the home is this fully equipped theatre room with curtain wall and platform already fitted giving you the real cinema experience at home!
Additional bedrooms all include quality carpet and BIRs and are serviced by the main bathroom complete with stone vanity, bath, shower and finished with quality fixtures.
The hard work has been taken away with full landscaping including artificial grass, deck, an array of beautiful plants and trees and concreting already finished.
Added features including large laundry, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, remote controlled double garage, blinds and much more.
Located in the Belmond on Clyde Estate which features a massive playground area, wetlands, parkland and situated just minutes from prestigious schools, public transport and local shops. This is luxury living at its finest.
PRIVATE INSPECTIONS AVAILABLE, CONTACT AGENT TO BOOK YOUR TIME!

Play in Parklands Opposite.
Gorgeous facade, homely feel, and low maintenance living at its finest, discover three bedrooms of perfect, all opposite your own expansive private parkland.
Quality floorboards to hallway, family and separate meals areas, overlooked by well appointed kitchen with stone bench and stainless steel appliances.
Fashionable neutral tones throughout, ducted heating, split system cooling, dry entry from garage and undercover alfresco.
Master favoured with stylish ensuite and WIR, and views to the before mentioned parkland, the two further bedrooms are equipped with mirrorred sliding door BIRs.
Close to schools, shops and situated in one lovely estate.

Description:
Henley built Brand New in Edgebrook!!!
Edgebrook is carefully designed by reputed developer stockland to meet family lifestyle, livability and convenience,
with walking tracks, dog parks and picturesque Clyde Creek running through middle of the estate and surrounded with all necessary amnesties, edgebrook is the place to call home.
Light and bright interior comprises a front master with walk in robe & luxurious en-suite with his & hers vanities. Three more spacious bedroom with generous wardrobe spaces to keep the rest of the family satisfied. Find elegant and fully equipped designer kitchen, with European 900mm S/S appliances, Caesar-Stone grand island bench & large walk-in pantry.Adjoining open-plan dining & family room with an additional lounge/ study and separate theatre room provides abundance of space to entertain and enjoy with family and friends.
If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG and stamp duty savings
Other features include
- European 900mm Stainless steel appliances
- Caesar-Stone grand island bench (with breakfast bar)
- Large walk-in pantry
- Ducted heating
- Stone Benchtops in Kitchen, Ensite & Bathroom
- Pendent lights in Kitche
- 900mm Five burner Cooktop
- 900mm Oven
- Front landscaping
- Remote control panel lift garage
- Fully fenced
- Feature wooden ceiling at entry
- Downlights allthroughout
- Elegant floating boards to hallway, living, meals, kitchen
- Quality Carpets to Bedrooms
- Well designed Alfresco
Your new home is located in easy access to
- Bus stops (route 897 Clyde - Lynbrook station),
- Waterfronts
- Future shopping centre
- Future railway station
- Wilandra Rise primary school
- Selandra Rise shopping centre (Woolworths, Jets Gym, Restaurants, Medical centre)
- Clyde Shopping Centre (Coles, restaurants, McDolands, Shell, KMart, Medical centre)
- Casey fields
- St Thomas the apostle primary school
- St Peters Secondary
- Cranbourne Town Centre
- Cranbourne East Primary and secondary school.
If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG and stamp duty savings
Call Ravi on 0444 522 762 to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.
*** Pictures are only for illustration purposes

Description:
NEST OR INVEST
Located in sought after Lilium state Clyde, this brand-new home offers both a comfortable and convenient floor plan which boasts 2 living zones.
The moment you walk in you are greeted with a generously sized living room which then lead to the open plan kitchen which includes stainless steel appliances, built in pantry with extra bench tops and overlooks the spacious living and dining area with sliding door leading to a covered paved alfresco. The master bedroom features stylish en suite and walk in robe, bedrooms two, three and four all include built in robes and are conveniently serviced by the central bathroom.
Added features include remote controlled double garage, laundry, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings.
The flooring is currently awaiting the purchasers guide as to the choice between carpet or floorboards.
Conveniently positioned close to local schools, shops and public transport, this is a perfect new home for the growing family or investor.
CALL ELIAS SALIMI ON 0412 676 898 OR PIERE SHAKUR ON 0421 043 010 FOR MORE DETAILS!
*Photo ID required at open home inspection

Description:
5 Bedrooms & Expansive Family Living on 476m2
Open home inspections are now available again. There is currently a 10 person limit so it is important to register prior to inspection. Those registered will be given preference over those who have not. Please contact me to confirm your booking.
Found in the Pasadena Estate in Clyde, this modern family home offers a versatile floor plan with a range of living options for the largest of families & entertainers.
- Formal lounge & separate family room
- Hostess Caesar stone kitchen with quality stainless appliances including 900mm oven & hotplates & dishwasher
- Breakfast bar and a huge amount of cupboard space
- Master suite with full ensuite & walk in robe
- 4 additional queen bedrooms, all with built in robes
- 5th bedroom options as home gym, studio or study
- Ducted heating & air conditioning
- Double car garage with internal access
- Covered Alfresco area & entertaining deck with spa, perfect for those who love to entertain.
- 476sqm block with low maintenance gardens
- Side access for cars, boats, caravans or trailers
If all of this isnt enough wait until you see the location! Pasadena estate is the place that offers a true family friendly lifestyle. Beautiful childrens parks and walking tracks offer plenty of space to explore, Casey fields and Casey RACE are only a stone throw away and all this is only a moments drive to local schools. Not to mention the property is also just a short walk to Shopping on Clyde. This home is a fantastic opportunity, you MUST add it to your list!

Description:
EXQUISITE-LUXURIOUS SPACE & QUALITY
Compelling spacious elements featuring uncompromising design, brought to you by Porter Davis Homes.
Where quality meets comfort as you have always dreamed.
Luxurious upgraded fittings from luxury porcelain tiles throughout, exquisite bathrooms completed with floor to wall tiles, multiple large living areas including 2 living rooms, a full seperate office, a spacious-functional & exceptionally well equipped central kitchen with water fall stone benching complimented by an incredible walk in master pantry & a very well appointed dining that meets the immaculate out door entertaining area completely concreted & finished with artificial grass- meaning move in and no more to do!
Prestige, seamless quality creates inviting comfort for all.
Don't miss out this ones a winner with a current lease return!
************Lease is in place until September 2021************
This is the ultimate investment and ready to move in by end of lease back!
Luxury inclusions:
Porcelain tiles throughout
Ducted heating throughout
Evap cooling throughout
Security system
Intercom system
Block out blinds
Stone benching
900 oven + 900 stove top
Walk in galley/pantry
Dishwasher
4 bedrooms with BIR (double basin ensuite to master/bath to main)
*floor to ceiling tiled bathrooms for easy cleaning
Study
Rumpus
Open lounge to dining & kitchen
Roller shutter to facade-frontage only
LOCATION
Located in our exclusive Belmond On Clyde Estate. Backing onto a 76 HECTARE SITE -The City of Casey's major destination for sport and art, our very famous "Casey Fields". The home of AFL's Melbourne Football Club. A prime destination delivering real-future value. A place where all sporting activities come together such as fishing, cycling, walking tracks, cricket, football, netball, rugby, tennis, athletics, cycling and human powered activities.
In a highly sought after locale, Belmond On Clyde is only a few years young with major growth ahead. Constructed with family orientation in mind, Belmond on Clyde is a community surrounded with significant future plans for all investors to take huge advantage. Further major facilities currently under way with already walking distance to Casey race "Recreation and Aquatic Centre, public transport, schools, medical & full shopping complex.
Dont miss this!
CALL NOW TO REGISTER YOUR INTEREST.
ONLY 10 PEOPLE THROUGH PER INSPECTION. MUST REGISTER BY PHONE OR EMAIL.

Description:
RARE OPPORTUNITY on 775 SQM!
Look Out! Opportunities like this don't come often!
This is your chance to secure a HUGE 775 SQM (approx) Block of Land in the highly desirable Edgebrook Estate in Clyde.
This block overlooks future parkland, positioned directly in front of the Clyde Creek waterways, ensuring you have a magnificent view all year round. The Edgebrook Estate will be home to playgrounds, picnic areas and walking tracks. Here you can design a home of class, sophistication and magnitude, all underpinning the lifestyle you are looking for, for years to come.
This Block is due to Title end of April 2020, giving you just enough time to research and discover the kind of family home you would love to build.
Positioned in a prime location, you will have close access to Clyde Recreation Reserve, Casey RACE' Recreation and Aquatic Centre and Cranbourne Little Athletics Centre which helps to keep an active lifestyle. And for all your educational needs, Clyde Primary School, Selandra Rise Family and Children's Centre, St Peter's College, and St Thomas Primary are all within very close proximity too.
Please call Declan today for further information. With a shortage of affordable quality sized blocks in today's market, this rare opportunity won't last long!
All information contained herein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.

Description:
Wonderful Opportunity to Call Home
Elegant near new house is ideally positioned in very well sought after 'Hartleigh Estate', situated just a short walk to play ground, walking/ cycling tracks, parks and wetlands.
Entering the house you will be welcomed by extensive timber flooring continuing through to the rear of the home. The master bedroom is positioned to the right upon entry and includes walk in robe and Ensuite, further 2 bedrooms are provided both ample in size with built in robes serviced by centred bathroom and separate toilet. Direct access is provided from the garage into the home.
A large open plan living/meals area adjoins the attractive gourmet quarters which features gas appliances, Caesar stone bench, and walk in pantry. A large alfresco area is accessed from the meals area and overlooks beautifully manicured back yard, requiring minimum maintenance.
All this is within short drive to Highgrove Early Learning Centre, Clyde Primary School, Casey Grammar School, Casey Fields, Casey Race, Shopping on Clyde and Selandra Rise Shopping Centres.
Contact Sid on 0430037053 to organise a inspection as this opportunities like this doesnât last long.
Insights: 23 Myrtleford Avenue, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2020 and 43 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Brand New Henley in Edgebrook
Located in Edgebrook estate which is carefully designed by reputed stockland developer to meet family lifestyle, livability and convenience, with walking tracks, dog parks and picturesque Clyde Creek running through middle of the estate and surrounded with all necessary amnesties, Edgebrook is the place to call home.
Light and bright interior comprises a master bedroom with large walk in robe & ensuite with double vanity.Three more bed rooms, two with walk in robes and one with built in robe. A main bathroom, Three living areas one including dining and kitchen with 900mm stainless steel kitchen.Covered alfresco and decent sized backyard perfect for entertain with family and friends.
Other features include
- SOLAR Panels (Save hundreds on electricity bills)
- Security Alarm
- Ducted heating
- Split System Cooling
- Stone Benchtops in Kitchen, Ensite & Bathroom
- 900mm Five burner Cooktop
- 900mm Oven
- Front landscaping
- Remote control panel lift garage
- Fully fenced
- Feature wooden ceiling at entry
- Downlights
- Elegant floating boards to hallway, living, meals, kitchen
- Quality Carpets to Bedrooms
- Well designed Alfresco
Your new home is located in easy access to
- Bus stops (route 897 Clyde - Lynbrook station),
- Waterfronts
- Future shopping centre
- Future railway station
- Wilandra Rise primary school
- Selandra Rise shopping centre (Woolworths, Jets Gym, Restaurants, Medical centre)
- Clyde Shopping Centre (Coles, restaurants, McDolands, Shell, KMart, Medical centre)
- Casey fields
- St Thomas the apostle primary school
- St Peters Secondary
- Cranbourne Town Centre
- Cranbourne East Primary and secondary school.

Description:
MAGNIFICENCE HAS NEVER HAD A BETTER MEANING
Newly built, exceptional robustness and high standard of inclusions exudes the very essence of modern comfort and superior quality.
Contrasting tones and colours to articulate and define remarkable beauty magnificently presented adding contemporary touches throughout featuring an irresistible outdoor centrepiece "pergola" of approx 5.8 x 9.2 offering a seamless indoor outdoor lifestyle.
A 2.5 car garage plus roller door to rear and window incl excessive space offers you the option for a home office-study, completed with fixed cabinetry (water proof base to cabinetry allows easy cleaning of garage concrete floors).
LUXURY
Ceiling fans, Split system heating & cooling, Stone to kitchen incl dishwasher and oven, Bath to main, 2.5 Car garage with window for potential home office/study, excessive storage-fixed water proof cabinetry to garage, Roller door entrance to rear, Block out blinds and so much more.
LOCATION
In a highly sought after locale, Belmond On Clyde is only 3 years young with major growth ahead. Constructed with family orientation in mind, Belmond on Clyde is a community surrounded with significant future plans for all home buyers to take huge advantage. Further major facilities currently under way with already walking distance to Casey race "Recreation and Aquatic Centre, public transport, schools, medical & full shopping complex.
The perfect combination of effortless elegance offering quality lifestyle in a superb and rewarding family-favoured locale.
Welcome to our exclusive Belmond On Clyde Estate where absolutely everything is at your door step. Backing onto The City of Casey's major destination for sport and art, Casey Fields.
CALL NOW TO INSPECT! A TRUE WINNER NOT TO BE MISSED!!!!!

Description:
NEW HOME IDEAL FOR FIRST HOME BUYERS!
CLYDE, The Edgebrook Estate: This brand new home, combining the benefits of modernity with traditional family living is sure to meet the demands and desires of the 21st century family. Located in the scenic, sought after Edgebrook Estate, all amenities will be available at your call.
This gorgeous home built on 562 sqm (approx.) exuberates contemporary features intertwined with elements of warmth and comfort. With a total of 4 bedrooms, 3 living areas and an adjoining meals area, all touched by natural light, this home is sure to impress while still meeting the ever-growing needs of modern families.
The ultimate show stopper has to be the master bedroom. With a double door entrance, walk in robes, ensuite and ample natural light, it will serve as your every own haven of luxury in todays' busy lifestyles. Stepping into the double doors, see your days worries instantly shed away.
Furthermore, this house is a mere 40 minutes' drive to Melbourne CBD, providing easy and fast access to the East Link, Monash, Princess and Western Port Highway.
Main features of the house:
- Brand New
- 4 Bedrooms
- Master Full Ensuite & WIR
- 3 living Areas
- Open Plan kitchen/ Family Dining Area / 900mm Cooktop/ Range hood/ WIP
- Alfresco
- Double Lock up Garage With Remote
- Heating: Yes
- Cooling: Yes
- Dishwasher: Yes
- LED Down lights: Yes
- Stone Bench Top: Yes
Chattels: All fittings and fixtures as inspected
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price
Preferred Settlement: 30/45/60 days
Location wise, this house has countless amenities well within reach by either walking or a short drive
- Pasadena Shopping Centre
- Eden Rise Shopping Centre
- Fountain Gate Shopping Centre
- Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre
- Cranbourne Primary School
- Cranbourne Secondary School
- Cranbourne Grammar School
- Chisholm TAFE
- Royal Botanic Gardens
- Golf Clubs
- Cranbourne Swimming Pool
This is sure to sell soon so don't miss your chance to make this dream home yours! Call Hardeep to book an inspection.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN HOMES
Every care has been taking to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, however we cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective purchasers are required to take such action as is necessary to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matter.
